display_long_description:
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.
[media]
# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
[media]
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
[media]
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
[media]
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
[media]
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
[media]
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ai_Dk2P2_JYQ7kNvwFZE4Lu&_nc_oc=AdnFV82lpV6os4ys4z8OiLeBLDuYiv9Ah-wKg_pfeamZI6HO2Wo4xDECK5EpiYuZl3w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ywbrs6SQHs9yxednoV7bcw&oh=00_AYHm0lAOfEMWQ8idJi9tE6buN6Uwc3wM3wY-QQfzKpk-jA&oe=67F4F209)
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks.

**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=OrxhIV69c0QQ7kNvwG1vknR&_nc_oc=Adn-O2XtkQVo1gSbRe6dE9Ujkdxqmv_5D5Mn80FpUekPTBAXRwP3_iCqyxt-f_a1D4w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ywbrs6SQHs9yxednoV7bcw&oh=00_AYHMg16H-UslA-tmXCaUYfc7fGdhOjscQkZj11XacESHfw&oe=67F4FF5D)
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=JyHOKVVO7mUQ7kNvwEoKRp9&_nc_oc=Adm9vhxI-JyUcDI3OrXsvCl1LOVNo4XzVyr5CnTUmN7ZMTrAxwBFdNB7CfAl8z7ZzCk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ywbrs6SQHs9yxednoV7bcw&oh=00_AYGBgyhP-fhIEV3MjR0UztdIMUZyoQNq2LsXZOCyIusA6Q&oe=67F4ED12)
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=89YGPVf_aYEQ7kNvwHfV2yN&_nc_oc=Admj-_O58GNml3_xaA9HicxQXkFATI8e5_kAhjGYkxTzx8t6lX_mYtgKPcePL5DSLjc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ywbrs6SQHs9yxednoV7bcw&oh=00_AYFIo3QrGlq3MQls5mpFORraqH1X7iDg5rtIooSQrFr-XQ&oe=67F50742)
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.
